@@ -52,9 +52,9 @@
 
     app.get('/api/data', async (req, res) => {
         try {
             const result = await client.query(`
-                SELECT date, income, outcome, clear
+                SELECT DISTINCT date, income, outcome, clear
                 FROM financial_data
                 WHERE DATE(date) BETWEEN DATE '${startDate}' AND DATE '${endDate}'
                 ORDER BY date;
             `);
